content: this text summarizes a legal case involving the dissolution of joint property ownership the case has gone through multiple court proceedings and the final decision confirms the previous decision made by the municipal court pulapola the decision states that the coownership of the property will be dissolved and the property will be sold through a public auction or another suitable method the price obtained from the sale will be divided proportionally among the coowners the counterparty appealed the decision claiming that the facts were incorrectly established and that there was a misapplication of the law however the appeal was dismissed as unfounded the court determined that the dissolution of the coownership was necessary due to the absence of an agreement between the parties the court also considered the opinion of a construction expert in determining the division of the property the counterpartys claims were deemed unfounded as they failed to provide sufficient evidence to support their appeal the court concluded that there were no significant violations of the civil procedure and confirmed the previous decision
